llm_res.rule: transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
The transferFrom function should only modify the allowance if the transfer of tokens is successful.
This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
